snippet: Two concussions in a six-week span have forced Dale Earnhardt Jr. out for at least two weeks in the middle of the Sprint Cup playoff race.
abstract: Nascar driver Dale Earnhardt Jr will miss at least two weeks of racing after sustaining two concussions in a six-week span.
lead_paragraph: Two concussions in a six-week span have forced Dale Earnhardt Jr. out for at least two weeks in the middle of the Sprint Cup playoff race.

headline.seo: Dale Earnhardt Jr. Is Sidelined by Concussions
headline.main: Dale Earnhardt Jr. Is Sidelined by Concussions
